column3: “So this strain is interesting, I tried it out of a suggestion. First it's cross, Chernobyl and Permafrost, the mix provides an incredible cerebral. Uplifting and inspiring thought and creativity; I see why this herb would be popular in the PNW. It is a go getter makes one prone to get something done. I would refrain from smoking this strain if you plan on just having a lazy day as anxiety sort of settles in the back ...”
